channel.title: [HELP] Inventory
channel.description:
Here is my problem : i made a dice system but i need something that checks if the player has enough money in his inventory
example how it is now : i dice 100 Mil but i don't have any money in my inventory but i can still dice
example how it schould be : i want to dice 100 mil but i don't have any money so a message pops op "You don"t have enough money"
could someone help me? :)

item.title: [HELP] Inventory
item.dc:creator: @_sarah1 _sarah_
item.description:
@_sarah1 wrote:

[quote=“EvoIllusions, post:8, topic:463816”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=567497.msg4122990#msg4122990 date=1349992393]

if (playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { *Insert your code here* } else { sendMessage("You do not have enough money to dice."); return; } Even better.

(I just gave the basic necessity needed.)
[/quote][/quote]
Thanks both of you

Read full topic

but i need something that checks if the player has enough money in his inventory

example how it is now : i dice 100 Mil but i don’t have any money in my inventory but i can still dice

example how it schould be : i want to dice 100 mil but i don’t have any money so a message pops op “You don"t have enough money”

could someone help me? :)[/quote]

player.getInventory.hasItem(995, 100000);
{
your code
}
else {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“You don’t have enough money to dice!”);
return true;
